website_summaries.verdict: A 100% polyester set that wears well, washes well, and looks good.
pros: Elastic all the way around the fitted sheet
Sheets come with a lifetime money-back guarantee
cons: Thin fabric seems to make these sheets more prone to rips and tears

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control.  2 different color sheets.
customer_reviews.text: The fitted sheet on the left was not white, as you can see in the photo. It was not "Silky Soft" as in the description. The 2 different sheets felt like they were made from to different materials. The top sheet was white and soft. The pillow case was also white and soft. Not sure how something that is obviously not white, gets put into the one for white.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Going Sam

customer_reviews.title: I love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets! My husband and I just bought a new bed, and I'm really picky of the sheets we use. I like them so much, I'm planning on ordering a few more sets. The price is completely reasonable for King size, which are normally super expensive. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Weber

customer_reviews.title: Purchased twice - different material 2nd time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set in the coral color about year ago. I loved the sheets! So soft and durable. However, I purchased a second set in the paisley pattern this time and the material is completely different. The material feels like plastic and is scratchy to the touch. Clearly different material than the sheets I ordered last year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot, flimsy, I’ll fitting
customer_reviews.text: Micro fiber does not breathe. Like sleeping between shower curtains. Stitching bunchy and elastic too weak to keep the fitted sheet taunt. Pillow slips have odd pocket flap that does not have a purpose since it won’t close over the pillow. The color is pretty and they feel soft but they are inexpensive for these reasons. If it wasn’t such a bother, I’d return them. Very mislead.
customer_reviews.author: flatlander

customer_reviews.title: Do Not waste your money on these sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are the poorest quality products that I have ever purchased. I purchased 4 set in two different colors. They came covered in black fibers on all 4 sets and had to be washed. The pillow cases are only half hemmed and the one set didn't match the others at all. fitted sheets were sown in a circle making it a nightmare to get on the mattress and the side seams on the flat sheets were all puckered. I will never buy anything from this company again. Be fore warned! They received one star only because it wouldn't take it without that.
customer_reviews.author: earl w whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are a MUST!! I will never buy another brand of sheets again! They get softer with every wash. Easy to put onto bed and never pull off. Love the two colors that we have gotten so far. I compared these to a pair we got for our wedding that was over $100... these are waaaay softer!! Do yourself a favor and buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Keela

customer_reviews.title: Stained sheets right out of box
customer_reviews.text: This is my first product review on amazon. I just moved to a new apartment and was looking forward to putting new sheets on my bed along with a new comforter. Right out of the box my white fitted sheet had stains in multiple locations. I decided to go ahead and try to wash/bleach the sheet, thinking returning them would be more of a hassle. Unfortunately, the stains did not come out. I'm concerned it's actually mold!? I've contacted mellanni directly and am hoping for a refund or replacement, but just a warning. If even the reviews seem too good to be true, they likely are. At least in my case, I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Although the price is good, not the best quality.  Very thin, and the color bled in the wash.
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality. The sheets continued to bleed color in the wash thru 3 washings. Also, they were very thin. Not sure the reported thread count was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy and Great Quality. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Listen, everyone ! This is the best sheets ever. My kids have heavy allergies and were itching all the time. I purchased this after reading that the sheets were hypoallergenic and cool sheets. I thought maybe this might only be an advertisement but when I bought the item and used it for a week now. I am completely satisfied. Please buy this if your kids sleep under high body temperature conditions. This is a very good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Kim

customer_reviews.title: JUST DONT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have NO idea why these sheets have such good reviews. I bought them after seeing a “sponsored” Today Show article. With all the good reviews and only $40, what the heck I figured I would give them a try. Take your money and put it towards ANY OTHER sheet set. I must be a sheet snob or something because these are not soft, comfortable, or worth buying what so ever. They are going in the trash. They are Chinese made and DEFINITELY feel that way. I wish more people would post honest reviews because these are truly the worst sheets we have ever tried. All these 5 star reviews must be from sponsored purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Moon

customer_reviews.title: Can't possibly be new! Stains on them straight out of the package!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure who to contact, so posting here as I received email to leave a review. These sheets had a large stain on them when I took them out of the package. I do not believe these are brand new sheets. The package wasn't ziptied together, just zipped in a plastic enclosure. I would not recommend these on that alone. I am attaching a picture of the large stain on these supposedly new sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Cinbear86

customer_reviews.title: Stripes prevent fitted sheet confusion!
customer_reviews.text: Friends, these sheets are nice and comfy, you don't need me to tell you that. Let me tell you about one life changing feature these sheets have: they are striped, and the stripes always go from the head to the foot of the bed. I've been struggling with fitted bedsheets my entire life, getting them mostly on before realizing I need to take it all off to rotate it 90 degrees. No more. It's a solved problem. I can't promise that I will always buy these striped sheets, but in general I will either need striped sheets, or hired help to do this task for me, and I know which one is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: K. Durivage

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why these sheets have such good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically looked for sheets with a good review at a decent price point. Why these sheets have good reviews I just cant understand it. They are terrible. Poor Quality and you can tell just when you pull them out of the packaging. They feel like laying on plastic wrap. Its currently winter, we keep our house cool and I wake up sweating on these sheets. Been using them now 3 months. Was hoping It was just "me", its not, my husband hates them too. I guess its time to replace them. Was hoping after a few washes we would "wear them in" but it hasn't happened....dont buy these, they stink!
customer_reviews.author: Christian LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to return these, completely unopened because the pink was much brighter than I expected. I have a Prime account and thought I would be able to ship back for free since this was a Prime item. However, I can't because it was not fulfilled by Amazon, so I would have to spend 1/3 of the cost of the sheets to return them. The onus is on me, because I didn't read the fine print or catch that not all Prime items are free returns. Nothing against the company or the sheets, more of the fact I found out that you have to search for "free returns" if is not "fulfilled" by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D Rossbach

customer_reviews.title: If you don't mind sleeping in petroleum waste products - This is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money on natural cotton with a 1000+ thread count. It will last for years and you won't be sleeping in a toxic soup that adds fumes to your home. Petroleum mining makes the microfiber sheets spread harmful chemicals into homes, through contact or through fumes that may be emitted over time. This can cause pollution in the buildings’ indoor air quality. I don't why I bought this set. I did not look into the material first and after examining them, I am not going to spend my time ironing sheets. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Spindler

customer_reviews.title: Poor fabric and quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after a bunch of rave reviews. I needed an extra pair of sheets, and loved the print. Unfortunately these were a big miss. They are the cheapest quality fabric I have ever felt. I couldn't imagine sleeping on them all night, as they were stiff to the touch. The seams already had some fraying and overall the quality felt poor. Obviously, you get what you pay for, but I can get a set of sheets from a big box retailer (the one with the red circle), for relatively the same cost that are better quality. I am still in search for great linens on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap, pooly made
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These sheets are poorly cut and do not lay well. The pillow cases are too short to fit a regular sized pillow and still close at the end so that you don't actually see the pillow. The top sheet is cut way, way larger than the fitted sheet - larger than any queen size sheet I've ever used. The sheets are extremely thin, so thin that you can see through them, and they are hot. Garbage. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hosepi

customer_reviews.title: do retain a great deal of moisture and cause me to sweat like ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting! Sheets are very well priced. But I did not realize they are 100% polyester and are fairly thin. The sheets, while very soft, do retain a great deal of moisture and cause me to sweat like crazy. The sheets seem to wash well and retain their color, but have a great deal of static out of the dryer. While I'm not happy with this purchase, I've decided to keep as a emergency backup. These sheets may work well for most, however I now know there is nothing better than 100% prima cotton in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Skyrod74

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY !!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think sheets could be made so cheaply. 1/4 inch seam around the outside that looks like it will pull apart with the first wash. I am surprised because of all the good reviews -- don't waste your money -- I will never again buy a sheet that I can't touch first, and examine the way it is made. Bottom sheet does not fit my king sized bed cleanly -- what a waste of money...
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I ordered 2 sets. They are soft and good quality... Can't beat the price! Update: When I wrote this had washed both sets, but only used one. When changing out to the second set I noticed the flat sheet was different from the first. The flat sheet on the first set felt just like the fitted sheet, a brushed microfiber, but the flat sheet on the second set has a satin type on the underside which retains the heat something terrible!! The first set great, cool, comfortable, and as described, the second set was different from the first so I will be returning that one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Meads

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how this product received so many high reviews. I bought two sets and they both are low quality. If you don't mind thin material that pills up right out of the bag, then you found it! I can't even stand to feel the material. It's similar to nails on on chalkboard. It's irritating. I'm using them as a cushion meaning I have a cover on top of them. My old sheets that are ripped are better than this.... If I could give it a zero, I would.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Sheets do not have the stitching shown in photos nor did they send me the right sizes
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed and irritated with this order. Not only does this set NOT have the stitching shown in the photos but they sent me a CAL king flat sheet with a queen-size fitted sheet. I ordered a king! I don’t know what happened but this order got all messed up. Irritated... hopefully you have better luck than I do! I thought for sure based on the reviews that this would be a good purchase but I was 100% WRONG! :(
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are a mess. They have a very loose elastic that runs through the whole sheet which does not keep the sheets in place. In other words, a rumpled mess. The sheets are also very warm which is very typical of microfiber sheets. Before bed each night I found myself pulling the sheets from one side to straighten them out. Top sheet creeps to one side also. My second set of microfiber sheets, never again.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is excellent, but sheets were stained and couldn’t be removed with detergent! Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.text: The sheets were purchased for my daughter in CA. While the quality is excellent, when she removed them from the package, the flat king size sheet was stained brown in a few areas as well as the pillow cases. She washed them,however, the stains remained. Since the color is cream, she wasn’t able to use any stain remover, just detergent. For $30.00, this is unacceptable and I will be contacting the seller and Amazon. I also purchased the same sheets in blue. I am very disappointed and upset that this product was defective and am requesting a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Believe the Hype
customer_reviews.text: I did days of research on sheets, and found these rated highly on several sites. The reviews on here were also good. So, I purchased these, even though the price point made me wary. I should have trusted my gut. These are too good to be true. The fabric is super thin and feels cheap, rather than "luxurious". Additionally, the fitted sheet was super loose and had at least 3 inches of bunched up fabric on the sides of our mattress, even though our mattress is a 14" pillow top queen. We are returning these, and will spend more on a better product.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with these sheets! The colors pop and don't fade, they are also true to the display pictures. I opened the package and got really excited because they felt to good, then after the first wash, they came out softer! It's not too thin and it's not silky. It's perfect for the summer (stays dry and cool) and i will be trying these in the winter for sure! Thabk you so much! I will definitely be buying more colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Sonja33

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about these sheets for our new king bed. The color is nice and they feel soft. While the sheets feel comfortable they are very thin and the elastic around the fitted sheet was literally showing through when I took them out of the package. The sheet was not sewn together properly and the fitted sheet is ripped and the white elastic can be seen. I chalk this up to the old adage you get what you pay for. I won't purchase these again because I don't know honestly how they will hold up. I regret not spending a little more and getting something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Wow quality took a nose dive. Awful set after loving 4 others.
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap did these go downhill in quality. These use to feel luxurious and were stitched so well and held up in washing and had a really good weight to them. This set.... awful!!!!! Felt like a cheap motel. Theres no longer matching stitching on the flat sheet. The decorative stitching doesn't even go all the way around the pillow case anymore..... it feels more like lining than decent quality fabric. I have 4 other sets and none were like this! I do not expect these to last for more than a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, side not sewn, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am finally opening these to wash and use for the first time since buying in December. The entire side seam in one pillow case wasn't sewn properly. They sewed along the full edge, but didn't catch both pieces of fabric. They are also very thin, when I hold them up, I can see through them. I don't these will hold up for more than a couple uses after I resew the side seam, which will have to wait until I get gray thread. The one good thing is the softness.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ondich

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on bed. Slips off 2 times a night
customer_reviews.text: Yes soft. Sheets don't stay on bed.. I'm fixing them 2 times a day. The elastic that holds them is minimal. I wish I bought my usual more expensive sheets from the company store. King size pillow case are ample. Lavender color is pretty..Fits my 13 inch mattress but as stated before they slip off very easy1
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Rusinich

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy !
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after reading an article on Marketwatch financial website stating that these were THE best sheets to buy under $50 ......Ummm,no ! Absolute garbage , 1 wash stitchings on seams came out wrapping around the sheets in many different places leaving a jumbled , knotted mess . Extremely thin and cheap material. We have other similar microfiber sheets we love, these were a waste of money. Or a knock off of the brand. Highly disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: kevin moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Super Thin & Wrinkle Easily
customer_reviews.text: I'm baffled by the number of positive reviews for these sheets. They're super thin and the material, while soft, feels very low-quality. I haven't been using them long but I don't see them holding up well. The corners of the fitted sheet don't stay on well. Also, they're not "wrinkle resistant" by any stretch of the term - mine are covered in wrinkles, even when folded straight out of the dryer. Very disappointed and definitely will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dori2003

customer_reviews.title: Bubble gum pink!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW In the picture the sheets look like a vintage rose kind of pink but in reality they're more like a bright bubble gum colored pink. I have to say though that they are incredibly soft. I just wish the color was more like the picture. ***These sheets are practically see through! When I washed them and put them on the bed I realized that you can see the mattress pattern right through the sheet. It looks so tacky and now I'm really disappointed. This wasn't what I expected at all.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Was good, until they weren’t
customer_reviews.text: So I have had these sheets now for 3 months. They’re soft enough but the quality still leaves much to be desired. There aren’t threads coming loose left and right, some tightening in weird areas. The flat sheet is way too big so it hangs down on the sides too much and makes the bed look sloppy. Pillowcases are also larger than the should be. And finally, the elastic on the fitted sheet is garbage. I would NOT recommend these sheets to anyone. In fact I am waiting on new sheets to be delivered right now and these will be dropped to the goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have the deep pockets as described.
customer_reviews.text: Great color and even feel great. But, the fitted sheet shrank after the first wash and dry. Now it is tight and doesn’t even go to the base of my mattress. I bought this sheet set for it’s “promised” deep pockets. Now, the fitted sheet is no better than buying a setof cheaper quality.
customer_reviews.author: Becki S.

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I received my sheets today and washed them 1 time and the stitching fell out of the pillow cases.. I will be returning. The quality is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T.

customer_reviews.title: Bedding snob gives thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I’m a total snob when it comes to bedding. I’ve spent countless thousands on mattresses, pillows and sheets. I didn’t trust the sheets at my parents house so I bought them some of these as a “thank you” prior to my arrival. I was pleasantly surprised. These sheets don’t feel very durable, but they are soft, lightweight and worth more than their amazon price tag. I’ve spent 5x this on sheets that felt like sandpaper. Happy to sleep on them any time. They are soft, silky, lightweight, and luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Will stain.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these sheets because they look awsome. They fit perfectly on our Queen bed. They are soft. Smooth and the color is so bright. The only problem is on the first day we decided to "use" the sheets. We "used them several times that night. We woke up to a blue canvas where bob ross painted a bunch of happy clouds. We washed the sheets right away but even after 2 rinses the stains would not come out. Very sad since i liked the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Kupins

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good price but found them thin, elastic around fitted sheet flimsy and after one washing pilled leaving sheet scratchy. Update on this review: after using after first washing, the pilling became so bad (even after using a depilling device) it was truly uncomfortable to lay on due to eternal scratching with movement. Will cut up for use as rags, but not sure they will even work as that. Wonder how it can be rated top seller on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Up north Red

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought3 sets only received 2 I was bummed. The Sheets are so soft and smooth when I slip in between my sheets it feels like I'm slipping into a soft cloud. Sheets are as described except one set had a problem with pilling. The other set is perfect! Just because you get one bad set shouldn't ruin it for the rest right. It's the one bad apple question? You read the reviews and make up your own mind!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Vanosdol

customer_reviews.title: These are my worst purchase
customer_reviews.text: I can not comprehend why an influencer recommends these or why they have such a good rating. They’re 100% polyester and 100% feel chemically made. They are like a cheap a Halloween costume from Walmart. They are soft but not in a cozy way, more of a swishy way. We put them on, went to sleep and both my husband and I slept awful. I hate them so much. They look nice and that’s it. I care way more about my sleep than about the look. I would recommend spending on extra 20-40 bucks on cotton sheets that won’t cause chemical burn.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Updating my review: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our Cal King Sleigh bed with Tempurpedic mattress. They wer silky feeling which I wasn't to sure about - a bit slippery. After using them, we're frustrated that we seen to need to remake the bed every morning. We're in our late 60's so there isn't a party in the bed nightly and we're not fitful sleepers BUT, the corners seem to come untucked constantly and we wake up sleeping on the mattress pad with the sheets in disarray. We washed them before using and we've slept on them so don't think they are returnable. SO, do we put up with the daily remake or do these go in the 'give away' pile? hmmm
customer_reviews.author: Peach1

customer_reviews.title: Only Sheets You’ll Ever Buy!
customer_reviews.text: A friend suggested these for me, and I’ll NEVER buy anything but these moving forward. They’re SO soft! I’ve spent over $100 on Egyptian Cotton sheets and every thing in between. These are by FAR the soctest, most comfortable sheets I’ve owned. They have deep pockets and hold up well when washing. Because of the microfiber, I would suggest washing alone (no towels or anything) to prevent picking. I’ve had mine for over a year and they’re still in excellent condition—no wash wear, picking, or loose threads!
customer_reviews.author: CruiseReview

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Just a couple of days after putting these on, I tore a hole trying to resecure the fitted sheet. I've done it plenty of times with other sheets and have never had a hole. I pulled them down and my thumb went straight through. Should have reordered the top pick from the wirecutter.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: First wash before use as i normally do with new sheets. Loose strings galore. Cheaply made. Poor quality. Disappointed. Didn’t try to return since I’ve washed them.
customer_reviews.author: MonaBeeReads

customer_reviews.title: Thin like an old-fashioned slip
customer_reviews.text: C'mon Grown and Flown Parents, you failed me with your recommendation for these sheets. I'm more into natural organic cotton, which is usually soft, durable, and breathable. These Mellanni sheets felt thin and cheap, like sleeping on a sheet made of old-fashioned slips, the kind worn beneath dresses. The fitted sheet er, slipped around and did not feel taught around the mattress. It's the kind of sheet that if I'd been sleeping on in a motel, I'd have felt the need for more of a barrier between myself and the mattress. I immediately placed these new (but laundered) Mellani sheets into a shopping bag and donated them to the local charity shop. I felt I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: PippyB

customer_reviews.title: Yellow Sheets True Color
customer_reviews.text: Leaving a neutral rating as I have not tried the sheets yet, but as I was shopping I wished someone would have posted a picture of what the true color of the yellow was & there was none. So I'm posting one now. It is more of a bright, Canary yellow vs the kind of mustard color that shows.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are the best thing i have ever purchased. I wanted to try something better then deep pocketed walmart sheets because they are never deep enough for my mattresses. I bought these after reading reviews about how they feel cheap and how they aren't wrinkle free. Those reviews must be really picky because these are definitely hotel quality sheets. They fit perfect and stay on even with people who move a lot when they sleep. The do wrinkle a little bit but what sheets don't. These are very soft and the colors are amazing. I have yet to try and wash them. I will update when i do.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This Sheet Set Is Inferior In Fit and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I chose this sheet set because it was advertised as extra deep pockets. I liked the color (grey) and the stripes. Unlike the other deep pocket sheet sets that were available, this set had only 2 pillow cases (others had 4 pillow cases). The pockets were NOT as deep and did not fit my deep mattress set like the other sheet sets that were offered. I know because this is my second purchase of this particular variety of deep pocket sheet sets. My advice : Don't fall for the color or pretty grey stripes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quality material
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with the beige sheets I purchased, I bought the white queen set (basically because they were out of almost every other color in queen size). The quality of the beige sheets is wonderful especially after washing. They feel like quality material, minimal wrinkles and a good fit. I received the white set yesterday, put them through the wash. I was so disappointed in how flimsy, thin and transparent they are. I expected them to be the same quality as the beige, not so.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay snug/comes loose! Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a year ago. They were ok for a few months but then started coming up after sleeping on them. They are not made for deep mattresses/pillow toppers. I measured ahead of time to make sure I purchased the correct sheets and now I have to put the bed sheet back on daily from coming loose at night. Super disappointed! I really had high expectations from all the positive reviews! :( :( The elastic is also not tight like a normal bed sheet would be. It’s cheaply made and overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The pinstripe are not the same sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in white a few months ago and they were the softest sheets ever! I ordered these pinstripe white/gray ones this time and they are NOT the same sheets! The feel is completely different and not worth the price difference that is attached to the pinstripe. Completely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Private to Sellers
customer_reviews.text: I washed the sheets prior to using. They came out of the dryer soft and wrinkle free. I don't know why but the four nights I did use the sheets, I did not sleep well at all. I think I might have some allergy to the microfibre material. I suggest that the top hem of the flat sheet be widened to at least 4". There is plenty of material to do so. The bottom sheet elastic is quite narrow and that concerns me as to how long that elastic will last. Other than that, the sheets seem to be fine for others. I would like to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Better Than A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these, I didn't trust the reviews. For the record, I paid full price for these, didn't get a refund, discount, wasn't contacted by the seller, etc etc. I've had these sheets now for about 2 months and they are the softest sheets I've ever owned. That on its own isn't that impressive, but combined with how strong they apparently are (I go through sheets like crazy because I spoil my golden retriever and let her sleep in bed, and she likes to scratch at the bedding before lying down). To date, not so much as a single tear. I got the gold sheets and so far after 4 washings there is no color fade or loose threads.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot

customer_reviews.title: Mystery Stains on Stain Resistant Sheets... wtf
customer_reviews.text: Picked up stains, and I do not eat or drink in my bed. I have no idea what the stains came from. Look like water spots but no drying. I am a Male so I do not have a desire to add oils or lotions to my body so we can exclude that. It is a complete mystery. And let me add, I just began using them only about 1 week (I laundry 2 times each month) single, white collar and unattached with no pets) so what is causing these mysterious stains and what will I see after the first laundry is still unknown. But we can be sure about is NO, they are NOT stain Resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonable

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the negative reviews and buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: The bad reviews were very bad. Like holes in the sheets etc. The good reviews were fantastic. These linens belong to the good reviews. The customer service and communication is top notch. Shipping was very fast and the product is exceptional. No smells that new sheets have. Good packaging as described and no issues with washing them. What they don't say is that they are deep pocket sheets. I have a 16" thick king size temperpedic and it fits so well it doesn't shift on the bed or loosen up causing wrinkles. They are soft and stay cool and breath very well. What else could I want in a nice looking affordable set of sheets.
customer_reviews.author: K T

customer_reviews.title: Back to my 100% cotton sheets
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike these sheets. I don't perspire a lot, but when I woke up I always felt rather damp. Plus my mattress isn't super-thick and the bottom sheet seemed to stretch. I guess I should have known that you get what you pay for. The price was cheap, and the sheets are even cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Uh-oh 123

customer_reviews.title: Live the feelung soft and ciol
customer_reviews.text: I love breathable sheet in cold winter also feel smooth to my legs..many years i suffer allegries psoriasis feeling heat that dont allow me sleep.. With the 1800 thread counts just right.. Only thing catch fuss ball so easy.. that from fuzzy blanet..still over the sheet cover ...not between fitting. Now it did said 4 pillow cases company owe me 2
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart, Doesn't Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: This product falls apart. We were so hopeful but these sheets are not worth it. Within a week, our pillow cases had holes in them (our last sheet set lasted more than 5 years). Figuring this was a fluke, we requested a replacement. The next set did the same thing within another week. They are also sloppy on the bed after sleeping in them the first night and the edge droops off really long on the non-hallway visible side (so one side can look nice). These are not worth buying. It is worth paying more. They have to last longer than this and I don't love that the bed always felt sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Costa Rica Fam

customer_reviews.title: Mehh
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are really soft and smooth and thin. Nice for summer. But I do like my better sheets. But its nice to have back ups. The print is barely noticeable unless looking very closely, but the gray is almost identical to my comfortable. Washed once and theres stains all over. The only thing i can think of was my detergent but ive never had that happen on anything so I dont know if something was already on the sheets prior. They also dont stay in place and pockets arent deep enough. Dont think they are worth the price but they are soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Darst

customer_reviews.title: Company agreed to send another set because of the defective ones received
customer_reviews.text: Fit was very loose, even after washing and drying per directions. Sheets were plenty soft, even when wrinkled it was hard to notice because the softness blended with the thin material did not build up an uncomfortable wrinkle, the sheets just had a very poor and loose fit. Corners were too long and would not fit tight at all, see picture. They seemed to be cut too long, and the elastic band was more for looks than the function of keeping the sheets tight. I contacted the company and they cheerfully agreed to send another set of sheets at no charge, and told us to keep the first set. Good company, just a chance poor sewn fitted sheet I suspect.
customer_reviews.author: Optiman36

customer_reviews.title: Happy Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I would never EVER think I would order sheets from Amazon. Mostly because I feel like I need to be able to feel the material beforehand. But guys. How could this many reviews be wrong? So I took a chance, ordered white and waited for them to come in. Oh my god are these sheets great. They honestly feel like higher end hotel sheets. The only issue that we found is that the king sized sheets were quite a bit larger than the actual mattress. Not a huge deal, just something I found interesting. We promptly ordered another set recently and will probably continue to do so when our other ones get shredded by our cat.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: They are poor quality sheets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on the high reviews. Basically, you get what you pay for. They are poor quality sheets. after opening them I washed them in cool water and the lowest dryer setting. I took them out of the dryer and the stitching at the top of the flat sheet had come undone and the stitching for both pillowcases came undone. Total poor quality but you get what you pay for. I'll go back to expensive quality sheets next time. Save your money and aggravation
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davide

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very soft!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because the weather is almost 100° right now and I had flannel sheets that were too warm. These sheets are cool and soft. They are deep pocket enough to fit the mattress and mattress pad. My big dogs sleep on the bed too and so far no issues with tears from their paws. I definitely think it's a great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: vmleiz

customer_reviews.title: You Get Less Than You Pay For!
customer_reviews.text: You get less than you pay for with these sheets! And, that’s highly disappointing with the reviews I read and considered prior to purchasing this set. When I first opened the package I was impressed with the softness and texture of this set. Then my excitement over having what I believed a new and comfortable set of sheets quickly turned to pure disappointment! As you will see by the attached pictures, the fitted sheet has a VERY LONG flaw which stretches half-way across the entire sheet. So, buyers BEWARE! Unless you want to take the chance on having to return your order, you may want to consider a different selection and save yourself this headache.
customer_reviews.author: GracysMom

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 sets of these sheets in white now. Every single set had black ink stains on them. I tried to piece together enough pieces in good condition to have a set without stains, and it wasn’t possible. My husband really liked these so I tried. Just save yourself the trouble, and forget about these sheets. It’s more of a hassle than they’re worth. Also, while these sheets are comfortable, but they are hot. I’m constantly waking up with the sheets kicked off, and I’m the type of person who always has to sleep covered up.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheet sets!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. Like the other 10,000+ reviews these sheets are incredible. I have purchased these about 4 times......for different beds. They are very soft. They are also what I would call thin sheets but I like that. They are not heavy in weight and because of that, they almost feel cool. I have only bought the white ones so can’t comment on the colors offered. I don’t expect them to last years and years with everyday use, not realistic with the lightness of the fabric but for the price, these cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha of California

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sheets but very itchy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the texture, softness, wrinkle-free and beautiful salmon color but these sheets are super itchy. I don’t understand why we are having an allergic reaction to them as we have other polyester blend sheets. I’ve tried washing them 8 times and we still have to take them off our bed because we can’t sleep as our skins itches horribly. Too bad because I really liked them and now I’ll end up donating them. They are made in China so obviously there is something off about the material used that may be causing this.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce de Ariz

customer_reviews.title: The good reviews have to be paid-for, buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: There’s no way that most of these reviews aren’t paid for. These sheets are just horrible. They’re like a firm tissue paper. SO thin, not soft at all, and the feel is exactly like tissue paper that you use to wrap present. I was so disappointed given all the great reviews so I washed them once on regular, once on hot, once with a ton of fabric softener....no change. They are terrible. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Is it time for bed yet?
customer_reviews.text: I got these about 2 weeks ago, and as soon as I opened the package I could feel how soft they were. Like it's incredible how soft they are! I put them to wash as soon as I got them and when they came out of the dryer they were still a bit wrinkled. but I couldn't wait to go to bed. Normally I don't like to sleep under sheets and a comforter because it gets too hot but they are actually really fresh. Definitely buying some for my son, and recommend it for all :) P.s good time to buy now during Quarantine because you get to lay in bed all day lol
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy_jas

customer_reviews.title: I hated these.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because we needed new sheets and quarantine restricted me from doing a typical TJMAXX/Homegoods run to feel and purchase sheets. Big mistake. When I got these, I could tell they were not for me. I either like a sturdy cotton sheet or a stretchy breathable feel—these were neither. Thin, wrinkled and saggy, I didn’t even finish making my bed before taking these off and returning them. They are artificial feeling. Not luxurious in any sense. Maybe I’m a snob, but I’d rather sleep on $20 sheets from Target than these any day.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Polyester just makes you sweat
customer_reviews.text: I’m not high maintenance with my sheets, all my other sheets are Threshold by Target and in my opinion are much better than these. These sheets are soft like everyone says but they are very thin, which would be great for summer, except they aren’t cotton so they are not breathable and just make you sweat. And in the winter I can’t use them because of the static they cause with every movement due to the polyester material. Even worse if one of my kids with fleece pj sleeps with us, every move causes a spark! They wash well and don’t wrinkle and all that, but I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: bjmok22Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The Softest Sheets. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: In my quest to find the perfect sheets, I looked on Good Housekeeping and these were the #1 budget pick. They are so soft. I love them. I can’t say how long they will last as I’ve only had them a week. I washed them of course before putting them on the bed and they came out of the dryer just fine. I plan to order several sets of these for every bedroom in my house. P.s. I have a texture sensitivity and most sheets feel scratchy but these are wonderful. I have bought expensive sheets from Macy’s, etc. but, none were this soft.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Love! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super fast! Packaged nice, neat and secure. And Wow... The texture on these sheets are high quality, smooth and soft. Not too thin and weak like a lot of sheets are. Very nice on the skin, already getting better sleep with these and have had them only 2 days. Zero complaints. I definitely recommend 💯 Thank You! 💞
customer_reviews.author: AutumnSun

customer_reviews.title: NIce, but...
customer_reviews.text: If you like CRISP cool sheets these are NOT for you. They feel like flannel. However, they are pretty and fit OK--a little baggy on my 15 inch mattress but what I do not like is that they are just kinda hot. Sure they are SUPER soft but that is because they are slightly fuzzy. I would not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fitzgibbons

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: they function as sheets. but that's about it. you get what you pay for I guess. altho why sheets are so expensive is beyond me. so far the best I've found is target brand. the ones with the special corners that don't pop up. but they're like 60 for king. these feel cheap. and they pick up bleeping everything. they are just constantly covered in lint. that's really hard to get off. I would not recommend these. oh. and they are SUPER loose on my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: nerd_up

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I have paid a ton of money trying to find the best sheets. From cheap Walmart sheets to high end Egyptian cotton. These are by far the softest and most comfortable sheets I have ever slept on. They are very light weight so you don't feel smothered, yet they keep you plenty warm when it's cold and cool when it's hot. I loved them so much I took all my old sheets and put them in my spare bedrooms and bought another set in a different color for my room. Would highly recommend these sheets
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!! (unpaid review)
customer_reviews.text: I feel really sad that I’ve spent the last 32 years of my life without these sheets. I cannot stand sheets that are thick and scratchy or that develop pills over time, and these sheets do NEITHER of those things. They are cool, smooth like butter, and excellent quality. They had zero problems fitting over my pillow top mattress, and I’m 100% buying another set for when I have to wash these ones. Best sheets ever, especially for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: MeaganS

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: I came to order another set and see they've gone up nearly $10 in 6 months. Another $10 and I can just get some name brand real cotton ones from Ross or Marshalls. With that being said, they are very soft and keep very cool. I particularly enjoy the pillowcases being smooth because I'm single af and hug my pillows. They also don't pill. Not stain resistant. I have some dirt stains from the dog stuck on them. It was a good buy when they were cheaper. Debating on another set....
customer_reviews.author: rudysmom

customer_reviews.title: The softest sheets ever.
customer_reviews.text: This sheet set was purchased specifically for a guest airbed in hopes that the sheets would be very comfortable and non-slip. I haven't yet tried the sheet set out as our expected guest will, unfortunately, not be coming when first expected. However, the sheets feel so beautifully soft that I'm sure they will be very comfortable. The colour is perfect. The company seems very concerned about customer satisfaction and helpfully kept in contact during the ordering and shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: lindelewis

customer_reviews.title: DIRTY AND USED
customer_reviews.text: Like most, I pick a seller based off the number of reviews. Being that this company has over 44k almost 5 stars I chose them. I purchased the orange sheets and the color was the same as the photo, when I opened the packaging, and pulled out the sheets to my surprise the fitted sheet was dirty. It looks like it was covered in lent balls but after a closer look it wasn’t lent. I have no idea what it was but it resembled dead skin 😩 the flat sheet was clean and it was missing the pillow cases. It was packaged correctly with the cardboard inside. I’m very dissatisfied and disappointed...I’m going with another company
customer_reviews.author: PILAR

customer_reviews.title: I was sent sheets with stains!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m beyond disgusted to open these sheets today and discover various stains on these sheets!! Not only are there stains but the thread is coming out of the pillowcases, not just loose string. If I were to wash they would completely unravel. I heard about these sheets on a blog and I trusted the opinion of that person. I planned to replace all 4 beds in my home with these sheets but right now I’m pretty irritated. I think I received someone’s used sheets that they returned!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: NOT BREATHABLE OR TEMPERATURE COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: ”Microfiber sheets are breathable, keep moisture away. These luxuries bed sheets stay fresh, cool during hot nights and warm in cold nights - leaving you and your family rested and ready for a new day. The Best Unconditional Lifetime Guarantee, Included For Free! Our 100% no questions asked, no hassle money back or replacement guarantee is the best in the business. Order now!” above is From the description— but these sheets, while soft, are not cool or breathable in any way. Hoping to get some resolution.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Best Sheets of 2020
customer_reviews.text: After exhausting searches looking for a great set of sheets, I turned to Google. These were listed as the 2nd best sheets of the year! Of course, I would have purchased the BEST sheets but with a price point of $120, I thought that is something to aspire to but does not fit my budget just yet! But I love these sheets and was more excited about the price and how much I saved!! You can't beat the value. They are soft and so cozy! I'm going to purchase another set for the guest room very soon!
customer_reviews.author: amjb0815

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely do reviews but I couldn't wait to do this one. My background is this....i hate buying sheets! I haven't found a pair I like that cost under $200. But these sheets are different. They are amazing! I like how they feel. The microfiber is what made these sheets feel nice. I don't know how long they will last because I have not had them long but so far they are holding up well. The pockets fit nicely on my matress and topper, and they don't wrinkle. As far as I'm concerned, these are worth buying and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T FIT PROPERLY
customer_reviews.text: Fitted bottom sheet just doesn't fit! I ordered a King set and it slips over the corners fine, but the sheet wrinkles and puckers around the corners and creates a lot of wrinkles under our bodies. Not comfortable at all. Plus once the top sheet is tucked under the bottom of the mattress, it constantly slips up and I end up with a massive amount of sheet on my face in the morning. It is because you get what you pay for! They are very soft and pretty but I bought two sets and cannot use them at all. Waste of money...giving to Good Will.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Max

customer_reviews.title: More FALSE Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I don't get all the glowing reviews! This is the 3rd or 4th item that I've purchased based upon reviews and the items have NOT lived up to the hype! After 1 washing, the elastic on the fitted sheet is coming apart! Seams coming apart from the sheet, itself. Wrinkle free? NOPE! Not even all that soft! The only good part - the pillowcases, at least they are holding up for the time being. Thanks Amazon for standing behind merchandise and for providing a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: TTacoma

customer_reviews.title: Love These Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have found these beautiful, soft sheets at a great price under $40. I purchased two identical sets so I can interchange if something happens to one should my design be discontinued. I wash them weekly in cold water, without fabric softener as recommended, and I can’t imagine they won’t last a long time. I found their customer service very helpful also. I don’t see how you could go wrong. By the way, my expectations were pretty high because of the reviews, even though I have not always agreed with reviews personally; however, this time I was not disappointed. I was not asked by Mellanni nor given a promo to write this.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Queen

customer_reviews.title: Not soft
customer_reviews.text: I’m super disappointed in these. The color was ugly, like a muddy green gray. They do NOT feel soft at all, they feel like the kind you would get from a general dollar store or something. I Hahahahaha we so excited for my husbands and my first king bed to arrive but our first night was not pleasant because the sheets were so unpleasant. I don’t believer the thread count was high. However it’s too late for me to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerusha Vox

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat this sheet
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are worth every penny. They are very comfortable. Super soft and durable. They fit my very deep mattress very well without a shortage of material to tuck in. Nothing more frustrating than having sheets that seem like they’re too small for the bed. They did not smell weird and did not bleed out when I washed them. This is an update. I noticed that the stitching opened up on one of my pillowcases. I emailed the customer service department directly and this company was very good at sending me out another set of pillowcases. They stand behind their product and I would still highly recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great the first few nights. Now terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Ive only slept on them 4 nights so far and washed them once before use. Soft but not crisp. Good winter sheets but not cool and crisp for summer weather sleeping. Very good deal, so far, for the price I paid. ***EDIT TO ONE STAR*** These are now, the worst sheets I’ve ever purchased! They stretch very easily. They stain very easily. If you sweat or have any oils on your skin at all, it will permanently stain the sheets. These are garbage and I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are soft however.. they don’t have the elastic straps to help it stay on the mattress. We have a king size bed and I have to pull the sides down AT LEAST twice a day! I bought a different set from amazon that is MUCH better, same price point and has the elastic bands that go under the corners of the mattress. These sheets would probably work for a smaller sized bed? Maybe idk. Not for me. My least favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Caviness

customer_reviews.title: Feels almost like satin, if you're into that.
customer_reviews.text: I got these sheets originally because my brother deemed them "the best sheets in the world." My husband and I enjoyed them for awhile, and then his mother got us some very high thread count cotton sheets as a gift. By comparison, these microfiber sheets are lighter and smoother (almost like satin), but they don't feel as high quality as the others. They also won't keep you as warm at night. These are great summer sheets, and great sheets for a guest bed that isn't used nightly. Love the variety of colors - very easy to coordinate bedspread colors with your sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Rita's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a back up set of sheets for my sons bed. They were a good price and after reading some reviews, I figured they would be worth the buy. Right out of the box, they were very soft and felt thick enough to be a good quality. With the first washing, they still felt the same softness. They fit the bed perfectly. Its not a deep mattress and they spread tightly against his mattress. If you have a deeper mattress, these might not work for you. Two washings in and the softness is still good. I think these are a great value and quality for the price. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: MakeupartistJen22

customer_reviews.title: Flawed
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of sheets I have ever bought that came flawed. The sheets have 4 good size areas of discoloration in the fabric on both the fitted and flat sheet. So I was very disappointed as they had such good reviews. They do feel soft, not sure about the wrinkle resistance as I won’t be using them because of the very noticeable discoloration. I threw away the package but am sending them back because this is totally unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Tbonia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and thin and wrinkles.
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned them When I opened the package. But I washed them as directed in cool water. Dried them on low and they were a wrinkled mess. Not the worst part, they are of the flimsiest material And not well constructed. It is my fault that I did not return them immediately. I am beating myself up. For this low price I should have suspected but there were such good ratings. I did put the bottom sheet on and can sctually see the color of the mattress underneath. They are going to the Salvation Army. Save your money, go to Walmart where you can at least feel and see what you are buying.
customer_reviews.author: M Maffet

customer_reviews.title: Pilling problems
customer_reviews.text: I liked these at first, but in less than 6 months they pilled up badly. They did NOT get softer with time and the quality got worse. They were also a little hot for me. I guess you get what you pay for. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Funston

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Lots of Pilling, Not for Hot Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I hate to leave bad reviews, but I wouldn't recommend these sheets. From the pictures, I thought they appeared to have decent quality. However, these sheets are microfiber which cause them to pill a lot. At first they seemed very soft, but after using them for a few weeks now, I would not have purchased them. They are almost more fleece-like in that they are so soft, they keep you very warm (we're hot sleepers so that was not good for us). They pill quite a lot and are very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the last ones
customer_reviews.text: First the positive - these sheets are excellent quality. The material, stitching, and dye are all good. Unfortunately, they simply do not measure up to the last set I received. The last set is so soft and comfortable, that I literally have to roll around every time I get in them just to feel the softness against my skin. My husband I and loved them so much that we decided to get a second set in another color. Unfortunately, these are just standard sheets. They aren't particularly soft, and that's super disappointing given that it is the only reason that I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Little Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Overrated.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the rating these sheets have. I have purchased a better product at walmart. 1. Loose fitting on my 12" deep queen mattress leaving an excessive amount of fabric on the bed. Perhaps they are wrinkle free, but you can't tell since it isn't a snug fit. 2. Other reviews claim them to be "soft", but they have the feel of cheap toilet paper you'd find in a porta potty at an outdoor concert venue. 3. Overall quality feels cheap. It's what I would expect if I were to purchase the bottom of the line sheets at walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Edwards
